GSD.product_version: versions from v4.8 to before v4.14.276
GSD.description:
drm/imx: Fix memory leak in imx_pd_connector_get_modes

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.276 by commit 38bf605bd8c83d942c8dcffaef3633b7d8b37549, it was introduced in version v4.8 by commit 76ecd9c9fb24b014a6f33fbb1287ede3be12158b. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/imx: Fix memory leak in imx_pd_connector_get_modes
